name: Opposite Gun
description:
Submission for the 2021 VR Super Jam with the theme of Opposites. A VR puzzle game with a unique twist, inspired by games such as PORTAL and The Talos Principle. This is the first time I have actually committed to and finished a game jam project, so that's cool. The game will only run through SteamVR on Oculus headsets, the Quest or Quest 2 with a link cable should work but is currently untested.

Press grip to pick up objects, trigger to fire, and B/Y to change the mode of the gun.

Programming, design, and all 3D assets were created by yours truly. Audio sourced from freesound.org and freesoundeffects.org. 

Made with love, kindness, and the Godot Engine.
